variable.name: period
variable.description: Trigger used for other modules - period in milliseconds. The trigger is sent once per the specified duration.

variable.name: tick
variable.description: Trigger used for other modules - Timer tick. Counts the trigger number starting from 0.

variable.name: enableServerHistory
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: serverHistoryLength
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: numberOfProcesses
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: enable
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: outputFormat
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: decimationFactor
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: decimationThreshold
variable.description: Configuration read from file 'WatchdogServerConfig.xml' - Configuration variable

variable.name: ticksPerSecond
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - Number of clock ticks per second

variable.name: nCPU
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - Number of CPUs

variable.name: address_sizes
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - address_sizes

variable.name: apicid
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - apicid

variable.name: bogomips
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - bogomips

variable.name: bugs
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - bugs

variable.name: cache_size
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - cache_size

variable.name: cache_alignment
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - cache_alignment

variable.name: clflush_size
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - clflush_size

variable.name: core_id
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - core_id

variable.name: cpu_MHz
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - cpu_MHz

variable.name: cpu_cores
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - cpu_cores

variable.name: cpu_family
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - cpu_family

variable.name: cpuid_level
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - cpuid_level

variable.name: flags
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - flags

variable.name: fpu
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - fpu

variable.name: fpu_exception
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - fpu_exception

variable.name: initial_apicid
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - initial_apicid

variable.name: microcode
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - microcode

variable.name: model
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - model

variable.name: model_name
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - model_name

variable.name: physical_id
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - physical_id

variable.name: power_management
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - power_management

variable.name: processor
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - processor

variable.name: siblings
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - siblings

variable.name: stepping
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - stepping

variable.name: vendor_id
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - vendor_id

variable.name: vmx_flags
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - vmx_flags

variable.name: wp
variable.description: Module reading system information - Static system information - wp

variable.name: maxMem
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Maximum available memory

variable.name: freeMem
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Free memory

variable.name: cachedMem
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Cached memory

variable.name: usedMem
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Used memory

variable.name: maxSwap
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Swap size

variable.name: freeSwap
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Free swap

variable.name: usedSwap
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Used swap

variable.name: memoryUsage
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Relative memory usage

variable.name: swapUsage
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Relative swap usage

variable.name: startTime
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - start time of system with respect to EPOCH

variable.name: startTimeStr
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - startTimeStr

variable.name: uptimeSecTotal
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Total uptime

variable.name: uptimeDays
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Days up

variable.name: uptimeHours
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Hours up

variable.name: uptimeMin
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Minutes up

variable.name: uptimeSec
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Seconds up

variable.name: cpuTotal
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Total CPU usage

variable.name: loadAvg
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - Average load within last min, 5min, 15min

variable.name: cpuUsage
variable.description: Module reading system information - status of the system - CPU usage for each processor

variable.name: message
variable.description: Module reading system information - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Message of the module to the logging System. The leading number indicates the log level (0: DEBUG, 1: INFO, 2: WARNING, 3: ERROR, 4;SILENT). A leading 5 is used internally for old messages.

variable.name: alias
variable.description: Module reading system information - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Alias used in the message as identifier.

variable.name: PID
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - PID of the process

variable.name: path
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Path where to execute the command used to start the process

variable.name: command
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Command used to start the process

variable.name: environment
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Environment variables of the process

variable.name: isRunning
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Process status 0: not running, 1: running

variable.name: nFailed
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Number of failed starts/restarts

variable.name: nChilds
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Number of started processes

variable.name: nRestarts
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Number of time the process was automatically restarted by the watchdog since server start.

variable.name: externalLogfile
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Name of the logfile created in the given path (the process controlled by the module will put its output here. Module messages go to cout/cerr

variable.name: logTailExternal
variable.description: Process module group - process external log - Status parameter of the process - Tail of an external log file, e.g. produced by a program started by the watchdog.

variable.name: message
variable.description: Process module group - process - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Message of the module to the logging System. The leading number indicates the log level (0: DEBUG, 1: INFO, 2: WARNING, 3: ERROR, 4;SILENT). A leading 5 is used internally for old messages.

variable.name: alias
variable.description: Process module group - process - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Alias used in the message as identifier.

variable.name: runtime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Time since process is running

variable.name: utime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - user-mode CPU time accumulated by process

variable.name: stime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - kernel-mode CPU time accumulated by process

variable.name: cutime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - cumulative utime of process and reaped children

variable.name: cstime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - cumulative stime of process and reaped children

variable.name: startTime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - start time of process with respect to EPOCH

variable.name: startTimeStr
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - start time string

variable.name: mem
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Memory used by the process

variable.name: memoryUsage
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Relative memory usage

variable.name: priority
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - kernel scheduling priority

variable.name: nice
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - standard unix nice level of process

variable.name: rss
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - resident set size from /proc/#/stat (pages)

variable.name: pcpu
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Actual CPU usage

variable.name: avgcpu
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Average CPU usage

variable.name: path
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the path where to execute the command used to start the process

variable.name: command
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the command used to start the process

variable.name: environment
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set environment variables needed by the process

variable.name: overwriteEnvironment
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - If true the environmet variables are overwritten. Else they are extended.

variable.name: maxFails
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the maximum number of allowed fails.

variable.name: maxRestarts
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the maximum number of allowed restarts.

variable.name: logfileExternal
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the name of the logfile used by the process to be started. It is created in the given path.

variable.name: killSig
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Signal used to kill the process (2: SIGINT, 9: SIGKILL)

variable.name: pidOffset
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - PID offset used when monitoring the started process

variable.name: bootDelay
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - This delay is used at server start. Use this to delay the process start withrespect to other processes.

variable.name: killTimeout
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - This is the maximum time waited for the process to exit after stopping. After, it is stopped using SIGKILL.

variable.name: logTailLengthExternal
variable.description: Process module group - process external log - Configuration parameters of the process - Maximum number of messages to be shown in the lofgile tail.

variable.name: enableProcess
variable.description: Process module group - process - Start the process

variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - PID of the process

variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - kernel-mode CPU time accumulated by process

variable.name: cutime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - cumulative utime of process and reaped children

variable.name: cstime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - cumulative stime of process and reaped children

variable.name: startTime
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - start time of process with respect to EPOCH

variable.name: startTimeStr
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - start time string

variable.name: mem
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Memory used by the process

variable.name: memoryUsage
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Relative memory usage

variable.name: priority
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - kernel scheduling priority

variable.name: nice
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - standard unix nice level of process

variable.name: rss
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - resident set size from /proc/#/stat (pages)

variable.name: pcpu
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Actual CPU usage

variable.name: avgcpu
variable.description: Process module group - process - Process statistics read from the operating system - Average CPU usage

variable.name: path
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the path where to execute the command used to start the process

variable.name: command
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the command used to start the process

variable.name: environment
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set environment variables needed by the process

variable.name: overwriteEnvironment
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - If true the environmet variables are overwritten. Else they are extended.

variable.name: maxFails
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the maximum number of allowed fails.

variable.name: maxRestarts
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the maximum number of allowed restarts.

variable.name: logfileExternal
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Set the name of the logfile used by the process to be started. It is created in the given path.

variable.name: killSig
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - Signal used to kill the process (2: SIGINT, 9: SIGKILL)

variable.name: pidOffset
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - PID offset used when monitoring the started process

variable.name: bootDelay
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - This delay is used at server start. Use this to delay the process start withrespect to other processes.

variable.name: killTimeout
variable.description: Process module group - process - Configuration parameters of the process - This is the maximum time waited for the process to exit after stopping. After, it is stopped using SIGKILL.

variable.name: logTailLengthExternal
variable.description: Process module group - process external log - Configuration parameters of the process - Maximum number of messages to be shown in the lofgile tail.

variable.name: enableProcess
variable.description: Process module group - process - Start the process

variable.name: PID
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - PID of the process

variable.name: path
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Path where to execute the command used to start the process

variable.name: command
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Command used to start the process

variable.name: environment
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Environment variables of the process

variable.name: isRunning
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Process status 0: not running, 1: running

variable.name: nFailed
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Number of failed starts/restarts

variable.name: nChilds
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Number of started processes

variable.name: nRestarts
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Number of time the process was automatically restarted by the watchdog since server start.

variable.name: externalLogfile
variable.description: Process module group - process - Status parameter of the process - Name of the logfile created in the given path (the process controlled by the module will put its output here. Module messages go to cout/cerr

variable.name: logTailExternal
variable.description: Process module group - process external log - Status parameter of the process - Tail of an external log file, e.g. produced by a program started by the watchdog.

variable.name: message
variable.description: Process module group - process - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Message of the module to the logging System. The leading number indicates the log level (0: DEBUG, 1: INFO, 2: WARNING, 3: ERROR, 4;SILENT). A leading 5 is used internally for old messages.

variable.name: alias
variable.description: Process module group - process - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Alias used in the message as identifier.

variable.name: enableProcess
variable.description: Process module group - process - Start the process

variable.name: deviceName
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Name of the device

variable.name: warningLevel
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - File system module configuration - Set the level when disc usage state is set to warning. If set to 0 90% is used instead.

variable.name: errorLevel
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - File system module configuration - Set the level when disc usage state is set to error. If set to 0 95% is used instead.

variable.name: mountPoint
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Information about the mounted device - Mount point of the device

variable.name: size
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Information about the mounted device - Mount point of the device

variable.name: free
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Information about the mounted device - Free disk space

variable.name: freeUser
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Information about the mounted device - Free disk space available for the user

variable.name: usage
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Information about the mounted device - Disk usage with respect to the space available to the user

variable.name: usageStatus
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - Information about the mounted device - Status of the disk usage-> 0:ok, 1:warning, 2:error. Levels can be set in the config section.

variable.name: message
variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Message of the module to the logging System. The leading number indicates the log level (0: DEBUG, 1: INFO, 2: WARNING, 3: ERROR, 4;SILENT). A leading 5 is used internally for old messages.

variable.description: File system module group - Filesystem monitor - VariableGroup added by the Logger - Alias used in the message as identifier.

variable.description: Network module group - Network monitor - Status of the network device - Received packates.

variable.name: tx_packates
variable.description: Network module group - Network monitor - Status of the network device - Transmitted packates.

variable.description: Network module group - Network monitor - Status of the network device - Data rate receive.

variable.description: Network module group - Network monitor - Status of the network device - Dropped received packates.

variable.description: Network module group - Network monitor - Status of the network device - Dropped transmitted packates.

variable.name: cutime
variable.description: Module monitoring the watchdog process - Module monitoring the watchdog process - Process statistics read from the operating system - cumulative utime of process and reaped children

variable.name: cstime
variable.description: Module monitoring the watchdog process - Module monitoring the watchdog process - Process statistics read from the operating system - cumulative stime of process and reaped children

variable.description: Module monitoring the watchdog process - Module monitoring the watchdog process - Process statistics read from the operating system - start time of process with respect to EPOCH

variable.name: avgcpu

variable.name: logTailLengthExternal
variable.description: Module monitoring the watchdog process - Logging module reading the watchdog logfile - Configuration parameters of the process - Maximum number of messages to be shown in the lofgile tail.

variable.name: logFile
variable.description: Module monitoring the watchdog process - Logging module reading the watchdog logfile - Logfile name

variable.name: targetStream
variable.description: LoggingModule logging watchdog internal messages - Set the tagret stream: 0 (cout/cerr+logfile), 1 (logfile), 2 (cout/cerr), 3 (Controls System only), 4 (nowhere)

variable.name: maxTailLength
variable.description: LoggingModule logging watchdog internal messages - Maximum number of messages to be shown in the logging stream tail. 0 is treated as 20.

variable.name: logLevel
variable.description: LoggingModule logging watchdog internal messages - Current log level used for messages.

variable.name: logTail
variable.description: LoggingModule logging watchdog internal messages - Tail of the logging stream.

variable.name: tick
variable.description: Statistics on lost data within this watchdog server - Trigger input

variable.name: lostDataInLastTrigger
variable.description: Statistics on lost data within this watchdog server - Number of data transfers during the last trigger which resulted in data loss.

variable.name: triggersWithDataLoss
variable.description: Statistics on lost data within this watchdog server - Number of trigger periods during which at least on data transfer resulted in data loss.

variable.name: directory
variable.description: DAQ module - Directory where to store the DAQ data. If not set a subdirectory called uDAQ in the current directory is used.

variable.name: activate
variable.description: DAQ module - Activate the DAQ.

variable.name: nMaxFiles
variable.description: DAQ module - Maximum number of files in the ring buffer (oldest file will be overwritten).

variable.name: nTriggersPerFile
variable.description: DAQ module - Number of triggers stored in each file.

variable.name: currentDirectory
variable.description: DAQ module - Directory currently used for DAQ. To switch directories turn off DAQ and set new directory.

variable.name: currentBuffer
variable.description: DAQ module - File number currently written to. If DAQ this shows the next buffer to be used by the DAQ.

variable.name: currentEntry
variable.description: DAQ module - Last entry number written. Is reset with every new file.

variable.name: DAQError
variable.description: DAQ module - True in case an error occurred. Reset by toggling enable.
